title: You may have to wait a bit longer for the MiniLED iMac Pro
content:
Rumors revolving around the MiniLED iMac Pro have been surfacing for a while now. We were expecting the anticipated Apple desktop computer to launch around Spring. The company has held Spring events before — during which it revealed new Mac models, such as the redesigned M1 iMac. Ross Young — CEO of DSCC — has shared

The post You may have to wait a bit longer for the MiniLED iMac Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The rumored MiniLED iMac Pro might have been pushed from Spring to the Summer of this year, suggests Ross Young — CEO of DSCC.
